text: Man of La Mancha is an American drama movie. It is directed by Arthur Hiller. It stars Peter O'Toole, Sophia Loren and Ian Richardson. It was released on December 11, 1972. It is based on the musical Man of La Mancha. Category:1972 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Arthur Hiller
title: Man of La Mancha (movie)
